mapper.insert: insert into member_action (action_id, member_id, status, before_emotion, before_emotion_time, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{actionId}, #{memberId}, '진행중', #{beforeEmotion}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '행동 진행', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '행동 진행')
mapper.select: select ma.member_action_id, ma.action_id, ma.member_id, ma.status, ma.before_emotion, ma.after_emotion, a.action from member_action ma LEFT JOIN action a ON ma.action_id = a.action_id where member_action_id = (select max(member_action_id) from member_action)
mapper.update: update member_action set status='완료', after_emotion=#{updateParam.afterEmotion}, after_emotion_time=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24'), updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_by='행동 완료' where member_action_id = #{memberActionId}
mapper.select: select ma.member_action_id, ma.action_id, ma.member_id, ma.status, ma.before_emotion, ma.after_emotion, a.action from member_action ma LEFT JOIN action a ON ma.action_id = a.action_id where ma.member_id = #{memberId} and ma.status = '진행중' order by ma.created_at

select ma.member_action_id, ma.action_id, ma.member_id, ma.status, ma.before_emotion, ma.after_emotion, a.action from member_action ma LEFT JOIN action a ON ma.action_id = a.action_id where ma.member_id = #{memberId} and ma.status = '완료' order by ma.updated_at

select ma.member_action_id, ma.action_id, ma.member_id, ma.status, ma.before_emotion, ma.after_emotion, a.action from member_action ma LEFT JOIN action a ON ma.action_id = a.action_id where ma.member_id = #{memberId} and ma.status = '완료' and ma.before_emotion NOT IN ('joy', 'hope') and ma.after_emotion IN ('joy', 'hope') order by CASE ma.after_emotion WHEN 'joy' THEN 1 WHEN 'hope' THEN 2 END FETCH FIRST 2 ROWS ONLY
